etou, i'm wondering if some one can help me finding a hentai manga. it's from a series (story 4 - 5 i think). 
It's about a boy who going with his brother to the beach, then the brother decide to find girl while leave the boy behind, then he get filrth by 2 girl (one of them is virgin) to have s*x. The brother came back complainning about not getting any girl at the end
Next chapter is about his brother leave him at home and the same 2 girl visit him. They make him bento that he share with his brother at the end. 2 girl come back by train at the end too
I remember that in the decription (old fakku) ther was a line like: girl love [            ] and this boy is the king
